title: Facebook : number of followers of popular beauty brands 2020
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Brand fans in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Brand fans in millions is highest at Month Bath & Body Works and lowest at Month Embelleze.
The minimum Month Embelleze has got 2.44 times less Brand fans in millions than the maximum Month Bath & Body Works.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Brand fans in millions in the y axis.
The Brand fans in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Bath & Body Works and lowest at Month Embelleze.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Brand fans in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Brand fans in millions is highest at Month Bath & Body Works and lowest at Month Embelleze.
The minimum Month Embelleze has got 2.44 times less Brand fans in millions than the maximum Month Bath & Body Works.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Brand fans in millions in the y axis.
The Brand fans in millions is highest at Month Bath & Body Works and lowest at Month Embelleze.
The maximum Month Bath & Body Works has got 2.44 times higher Brand fans in millions than the minimum Month Embelleze.
The Month Bath & Body Works has the highest Brand fans in millions, followed by Risqué, and Mary Kay Brasil. Down to the Month Embelleze which is the lowest.
The Brand fans in millions has decreased over the past 10 Months.
The Month Bath & Body Works tends to be 1.74 percent higher than average.
